thread.section_title: Legal Support Network - Legal Finance Jobs
thread.title: Accounts Payable Assistant - FTC

title: Accounts Payable Assistant - FTC
text:
Job Ref: 901395 
This client is a truly global law firm that is headquartered in the USA. They operate in 15 countries and provide legal advice to some of the world’s best known corporate organisations. 
They are recruiting for an Accounts Payable Assistant to join their finance department. This role is a 6-month fixed-term contract. You will have previously worked in accounts payable / purchase ledger within a professional services firm, ideally law. 
Responsibilities include: 
Maintaining the PO system and querying inaccuracies.Supplier statement reconciliations. 
Processing payment runs via BACS. 
Dealing with supplier and staff queries.Raising multi-currency CHAPS payments where necessary.Various ad hoc administrative duties, as required. 
Candidate Profile 
Experience in accounts payable / purchase ledger within a professional services firm, ideally law. 
Important Notice 
It is Career Legal’s policy, as a matter of courtesy, to respond to all applications within three working days. However because of the volume of applications, we are sometimes unable to respond to individual candidates. If we have not contacted you within three working days your application has been unsuccessful and your details have not been retained. Please apply for any other position that you may see in the future. Thank you. 
Career Legal is a Recruitment Agency and is advertising this contract vacancy on behalf of one of its Clients.
